website_summaries.verdict: For smaller landscaping jobs, this machine is terrific. Good choice for homeowners who want something lighter and easier to move.
pros: Despite the bargain price, this compactor delivers quite a punch at 5,600 vibrations per minute
Great for building a patio or pouring a driveway
Easy to fold up, with built-in wheels that make transporting a breeze
Plate's upturned edges help with cornering
cons: Not durable enough for tougher jobs

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this instead of renting because I needed it for a longer period of time and I didn't want to rush the job to save money on rental fees. For a backyard project like mine this compactor was perfect and performed flawlessly. It's not too big where it's harder to handle and the fold away wheels makes it easy to move around. Don't let the small size fool you, it can get the job done. My project was about 30 X 20 and it started and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Orion619

customer_reviews.title: Great for homeowners and paving projects
customer_reviews.text: Compact and portable, easy to store, foldable, and rolling wheels are a breeze to transport - even on dirt. Engine starts super easily. Controls are easy to use. On dirt, noise level is about the same as a 4-stroke lawnmower. On gravel or rock, noisier. The best thing is you can buy this cheaper than renting one for a few days. Also great for touch-ups, when one or two pavers settle slightly and you want to flatten it again.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I’ve used it several times while building the base for a retaining wall. If I had to rent one it would have cost more than this one for the amount of time I needed it. it’s easy to use, light enough to maneuver alone, has wheels to move it back and forth to the job. starts easy and stops on a dime.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Ludy

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Beware the item is not very durable. The mount for rubber mat gets in the way of compacting and after just 6 months of light use in residential job sites the engine seized up and wont turn. The paint holds up great tho if that's what you are looking for in a jobsite tools.
customer_reviews.author: Young Bae

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Only used it for about three hours in the whole things falling apart muffler broke gas cap rattles loose not very good quality throttle cable not working
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Akers

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Performance
customer_reviews.text: Very good performance in building a 20' x 30' paver patio
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well designed for transporting to job site
customer_reviews.text: Arrived faster than expected. The single box that it came in looked like it fell off a fast moving truck. However, the machine was in good condition & started right up. The wheels are a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES VANBIBBER

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to compact sand inside my garage. Had to back fill 42" across the 1253 sqft garage and 8 ft where they overdug along the basement walls. Spent two days hitting it and after we were done not even a heavy tractor was leaving an imprint. Was easy to handle and was adequate for what we needed it for. Seems to be holding up well except the handle bar cushion started to wear out from the handling. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: tja

customer_reviews.title: Bad Shipping, Broken Product, Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: It took UPS six days to deliver this to me instead of two. When it arrived, it was in a pillow box. It had no protection and the plastic cover for the drive belts was broken. It had oil all over it even though it was supposed to arrive without oil. Assembly is the only thing that was easy. Once assembled, I added oil and gas. Tried to start per instructions. Wouldn't start. Crap! Do not buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: James Gill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good little compactor. It can compact about 2-4" of stone/stonedust at a time. Starts with 1 pull.
customer_reviews.author: speechman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ($, durability, value) compactor
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly perfect compactor....well made, durable, tough, heavy duty, big 6.5 hp engine, does the best job ok be can expect...didn't want to rent one that works once in a while..USA made!
customer_reviews.author: This Sheepdog Carrys!

customer_reviews.title: i got the item broken
customer_reviews.text: see the photo, the item is broken when it was delivered >>i would like to either return it or got another new item
customer_reviews.author: mohamad alrefaei

customer_reviews.title: Yardmax YC0850 Review
customer_reviews.text: I just got the unit and it was easy to completed the assembly. The transport wheels really make it easy to move about and store. It was shipped in a cardboard box that has some plywood reinforcement on the front and back. My unit was shipped with a QT of oil that had been punctured and leaked all over the unit. It took me an hour to clean off the oil before I could assemble. There was some damage to the handle all of which were cosmetic. Dan
customer_reviews.author: Sue Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Money well spent. I use it for the sidewalk I'm paving around the house and its just great to have it. Comparing to the next thing that is close and almost 200 bucks more, this one is a steal
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: We used it on about 3 projects so far and it always starts up on the first pull. I was impressed by the quality of the OHC engine, fuel shut off and other features. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I will still give 5 stars though there were some bolts and nuts I think they forgot to include in the box. I use it already and for me it is worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Rhodell R Acan

customer_reviews.title: Runs and functions as designed
customer_reviews.text: Runs great. Used on three jobs already. Wheel rest is poor. They fall when operating so buy a small bungee strap too.
customer_reviews.author: Alto MI

customer_reviews.title: customer service is of no service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased September 2019. Tried to start up last week. Couldn't get it to start. Called "customer service ". They were no help and basically blew me off. Wouldn't buy yardmax products in the future
customer_reviews.author: Habsgal

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even put together, missing hardware kit with screws and bolts to attach handle. Project is stalled now till Yardmax replies to email.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Banse Jr.

customer_reviews.title: it never starts
customer_reviews.text: i bought this product and try to use after 1 month so i was not able to return .i check with my mechanic -he was not able to start it .also i cant contact seller to ask what to do with this verry disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Otar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small paver brick jobs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the project I have at home way cheaper to buy one and rent one use them previously on job sites happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Vielhauer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product 4 times and it smokes black and runs terrible very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: bridget mohr

customer_reviews.title: Sure beats paying rental fees a few times.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built, and great priced piece of equipment. It was very easy to assemble, 4 bolts and your done. I like the throttle control right at your fingertips!! I bought this for a retaining wall project and I also have a few sidewalks, and paver walkways to do. I Highly recommend buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality machine and wheels are very helpful for moving the machine around.
customer_reviews.author: mlv

customer_reviews.title: Careful!!
customer_reviews.text: Broken in the first 2 hours, hopefully I saw the missing part and take out the rest before the machine crashed. I hope seller send me a new piece to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos F.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my son. He hasn't used ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son. He hasn't used it yet but is very impressed. Heavy duty but small enough to use in small areas.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great machine good value
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine great value works as good or better than the big ones that are five times the cost. My whole cool and loves it because it’s mobile it’s late and you could get into a lot of spots with it and it always starts on the first pull
customer_reviews.author: Ely V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because of the quality for the money. I use this product to compact the bottom of swimming pools to get a even and smoother base for swimming pool bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Compactor for small job
customer_reviews.text: Maybe for a small job it will be great , but not 3-4 in gravel or soil
customer_reviews.author: Gilson Pires

customer_reviews.title: Good price and value.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for home use. Not very heavy so you need to compact multiple thin layers to get complete compaction.
customer_reviews.author: DCG

customer_reviews.title: love this product very well built great design great performance ...
customer_reviews.text: love this product very well built great design great performance if ever needed would definately buy again
customer_reviews.author: carl zewe

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice machine quality built and is perfect for the homeowner, low cost is worth having around when you need it. Needs a better shipping package, mine got tortured by UPS and the oil supplied with it was all over the machine.
customer_reviews.author: George P.

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a nice product. As always Amazon delivered in a snappy fashion. Only two days. I have not used it yet i will leave another review when I am done with the patio I am building.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA DOWNS

customer_reviews.title: Love The Wheels
customer_reviews.text: The compactor arrived A Day or so before promised, everything was in great shape. it was easy to put together, and started up right away. I put it to the test last weekend, and it works better than expected. Get the ground wet ,let it soak in for a bit and it will turn it into a rock. Thanks Reliable Marketplace.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to start and operate. Did a fantastic job of prep for patio stones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I fortunately it took me a year to open the box to find the filter box broken. Reaching out to vendor now for parts
customer_reviews.author: Rich33

customer_reviews.title: Small but it works
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but surprising it passed my expectations for fast results I recommend the larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Argumedo

customer_reviews.title: Not a good service
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed The box arrived on a really bad conditions And when I opened it I realizases that it was missing pieces I’m angry with the bad service
customer_reviews.author: Jaime L.

customer_reviews.title: Still worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Item came damaged and missing parts and no whole was drilled for the throttle control also nuts and bolt were not fully tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Mike schryver

customer_reviews.title: love it. ready for my next project
customer_reviews.text: been used 2 time to done some work my steep back yard to be level , love it . ready for my next project !
customer_reviews.author: my vshape !

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to roll around with the wheels it has. Makes our job much easier and faster to complete
customer_reviews.author: Yaquelin

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Starts up first pull
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Starts up first pull, light enough to put in the truck yourself but still enough power for walkways and patios!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money. I was pleasantly surprised with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: william strong

customer_reviews.title: It came incomplete
customer_reviews.text: The product came incomplete parts were missing air filter and screws were missing
customer_reviews.author: Iskander

customer_reviews.title: Pretty frustrated with this machine as the instructions do not ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty frustrated with this machine as the instructions do not tell you what type of oil to add and that it has no oil that comes with it which is needed to run. It works pretty good and I am happy with the performance. After talking to customer service the oil need is 30 weight. Please advise future customers on this.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: as they had a better presentation their prices will undoubtably go
customer_reviews.text: We have been using it to build all pays for patios and it has Thus far been performing well, my impression at this time of this new company (yardmax) they are delivering quality product and partner with Briggs & Stratton, as they had a better presentation their prices will undoubtably go off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great starts pretty easy after sitting for a month at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

product_meta.title: YARDMAX YC0850 1850 lb. Compaction Force Plate Compactor, 2.5 hp, 79cc, 5900 BPM
product_meta.description: Style:1850 lb. Compaction ForceThis compact 79cc vibratory plate compactor model delivers 5900 blows per minute courtesy of its 2. 5 HP engine, making it ideal for residential paving projects. Before your start pouring concrete, laying bricks or stone, be sure you pack down all aggregate, soil and debris for a tight, air-free foundation. Getting it right will make for a long-lasting patio or walkway, resistant to erosion for years to come.
feature_bullets: Self-propelled, 79cc model delivers 5900 blows per minute with a 2. 5 HP engine
Single, stamped plate has no weld beads to prevent rusting over time — it offers more strength, flatness and smoothness
Included fold-up transport wheels are attached and able to be used anytime
Mounted, three-point handle with rubber bushings for vibration absorption.Centrifugal flyweight for superior engine control
Convenient fold-down handle makes for compact storage
